additionalInformation: For strength heroes, it grants 1 armor and 6 attack speed.
For agility heroes, it grants 1 armor, 6 attack speed and 6 attack damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 1 armor and 6 attack speed.
name: Band of Elvenskin
description: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.
trivia: This item was named Boots of Elvenskin in DotA and for some time during the beta of Dota 2. The name was likely changed to avoid confusion with the other boot items, as Band of Elvenskin does not provide any movement speed bonus.
